reviews.review: It’s a great game... that you shouldn't take it very seriously with the number of bugs in the core gameplay. I still consider it the most fun Asymmetrical multiplayer game I’ve ever played. It does suffer from balancing issues, but more often the not you can achieve your goal of the reason you play video games, which is to have fun. The people that do take the game more seriously can feel some satisfaction due to the skill ceiling the game provides with certain characters. The game does come with its fair amount of grinding, but it is satisfying to get the perks you desire for builds on characters. Overall, I believe this game has a lot of potential to be fun even for a newcomer, with or without friends. The devs even though they don’t always focus on the core issues of the game, they still work on the game and come out with new and sometimes fresh content.

The best asymmetric multiplayer game I've ever played.
It gets regular updates, balance patches, cosmetics and events and so invites you to take a look again and again.
Many killers or survivors can also be bought through in-game unlockable currency.
Especially if you are looking for a game that you can play regularly with friends, you should take a look at Dead by Daylight.

Dbd é um jogo longe de ser perfeito mas que há anos faz o feijão com arroz muito bem e sabe atrair novos players, já os veteranos ficam pela nostalgia ou diversão mas em algum momento o jogo vai te cansar um pouco, imagino que com a maioria pelo menos. 

Não julgo os devs no sentido de manter o jogo vivo, porque certamente é uma tarefa muito difícil, e até então ta ai, né. Só acredito que eles deveriam escutar mais a playerbase deles, testar algumas coisas novas, novos modos de jogo e por ai vai.

Masa para empanadas

Ingredientes
3 tazas de harina de trigo
¼ a ½ cucharadita de sal
6 onzas de mantequilla sin sal (6 onzas = 170 gramos)
1 huevo
¼ a ½ taza de agua o leche agregue la cantidad necesaria hasta que la masa quede suave

Preparación
Para hacer la masa casera para empanadas para el horno:
Mezcle la harina y la sal en la procesadora de alimentos.
Añada la mantequilla, el huevo y el agua o leche (poco a poco), pulse y mezcle hasta que se empiecen a formen bolitas pequeñas de masa suave.
Saque la masa de la procesadora y forme una bola con la masa.
Si no tiene procesadora, para hacer la masa de empanadas a mano, siga la mismas instrucciones para mezclar todo junto usando las manos. Use las manos para mezclar la masa hasta que todos los ingredientes estén bien incorporados y se obtenga una masa suave. Puede agregar agua o leche adicional si la masa está seca.
Separe la masa en dos bolas grandes y aplástelas en forma de disco. Se puede usar de inmediato o se puede guardar refrigerado durante 1 a 2 días.
Estire la masa con un rodillo hasta obtener una capa fina y corte redondeles para las empanadas del tamaño que desee (puede usar moldes redondos, un plato pequeño o una taza). Otra opción es formar varias bolitas de tamaño mediano (o pequeño según el tamaño de las empanadas que quiere hacer), y luego estirar cada bolita individualmente – se puede también usar una prensa de tortillas para estirar la masa.
Los discos o tapas caseras de empanadas se pueden usar inmediatamente o se pueden guardar en la refrigeradora para usarlas más tarde. También se pueden congelar si lo desea.
BUENARDO ESTE JUEGO :)

Juego asimétrico de 1vs4 siendo tu un asesino que tienes que golpear y colgar a los otros jugadores.
Para mí uno de los mejores juegos pvp y eso que no me suele gustar el pvp. Me encanta poder jugar con asesinos de mis películas o series favoritas y luego con los que se inventan los propios creadores. 

Pros: 
- Muchas horas de juego con el contenido base.
- Prácticamente único en su genero y el único que lo hace perfecto.
- Puedes jugar con amigos.

Contras:
- Puede que tengas que comprar algún asesino o superviviente extra por sus habilidades.
- Puede llegar a frustrar por la gente tóxica que hay (pero como en cualquier juego on-line)

Do you love playing against killers who are broken every update, Do you enjoy playing with team mates who care mostly about their own safety and do not play objective, do you enjoy a toxic community that loves to put blame on everyone other than them. then you'll love Dead by Daylight. in all seriousness this game does have its problems but i enjoy it for what it is.

Mix a solid game concept with a bunch of small bugs and you have Dead by Daylight.
Welcome to game that can be frustrating at times, but trust me when I say that this game offers thousands of hours of fun. Take on the role of survivor or killer and do your job.

This game has one of the most mentally handicapped community ever. The goal of your match is to activate 5 generators to power an exit gate and escape. If nobody touches a generator to power the exit gates, the killer can slowly but surely hook everyone leaving no survivors. The glober (console) community includes some of the lowest IQ players I have ever had the misfortune of playing alongside. Terrible community. Do not play solo queue if you don't want to rip out every hair on your body. Do not give this game any money until they make the objective clear to every player. 
Sincerely 
-Someone stuck in low rank that used to enjoy this game.
